IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: SUPPORT SCHOLARSHIPS AND SPECIAL PROGRAMS AT EASTERN CONNECTICUT STATE UNIVERSITY.
IRS990.MissionDesc: THE ECSU FOUNDATION, INC. IS DEDICATED TO THE SUPPORT OF SCHOLARSHIPS AND SPECIAL PROGRAMS AT EASTERN CONNECTICUT STATE UNIVERSITY. THE FOUNDATION IS DIRECTED BY A VOLUNTEER BOARD OF BUSINESS LEADERS AND CIVIC-MINDED FRIENDS OF THE UNIVERSITY. THE FOUNDATION SOLICITS FUNDS FOR A VARIETY OF PURPOSES CENTRAL TO THE HEALTH OF THE UNIVERSITY, INCLUDING STUDENT SCHOLARSHIPS (UNDERGRADUATE AND GRADUATE), LECTURESHIPS, EQUIPMENT, SPECIAL PROGRAMS AND NEW ACADEMIC INITIATIVES. THE FOUNDATION PROVIDES VITALLY NEEDED DOLLARS FOR A VARIETY OF PROJECTS AND PROGRAMS THAT ARE NOT FUNDED BY THE STATE BUDGET. FOUNDATION SCHOLARSHIPS CREATE THE CRITICAL MARGIN OF DIFFERENCE FOR STUDENTS WHO MIGHT OTHERWISE NOT BE ABLE TO ATTEND EASTERN CONNECTICUT STATE UNIVERSITY.
IRS990.Desc: PROMOTION, ENCOURAGEMENT AND ASSISTANCE OF ALL FORMS OF EDUCATION, RESEARCH AND ATHLETICS AS IT RELATES TO EASTERN CONNECTICUT STATE UNIVERSITY.

Form990ScheduleAPartVIGrp.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: SCHEDULE A, PART II, LINE 10, EXPLANATION OF OTHER INCOME:

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ARTWORK HELD BY THE FOUNDATION IS MADE UP OF PAINTINGS, DRAWINGS, AND SCULPTURES, WHICH WERE DONATED TO THE FOUNDATION OR PURCHASED FROM ARTISTS. THE COLLECTION OF ART HELPS SUPPORT THE UNIVERSITY'S ART PROGRAM AND THE ARTISTS BY DISPLAYING AND RECOGNIZING ARTWORK THROUGH PUBLIC DISPLAYS AND GALLERIES.
THE FOUNDATION MAINTAINS THE ENDOWMENT TO PROVIDE SCHOLARSHIPS AND FUND EDUCATIONAL PROGRAMS AT EASTERN CONNECTICUT STATE UNIVERSITY.

THE FOUNDATION'S FEDERAL AND STATE INCOME TAX RETURNS PRIOR TO FISCAL YEAR 2015 ARE CLOSED AND MANAGEMENT CONTINUALLY EVALUATES EXPIRING STATUTES OF LIMITATIONS, AUDITS, PROPOSED SETTLEMENTS, CHANGES IN TAX LAW AND NEW AUTHORITATIVE RULINGS. THE FOUNDATION HAS NO UNRECOGNIZED TAX BENEFITS AT JUNE 30, 2018. IF THE FOUNDATION HAD UNRELATED BUSINESS INCOME TAXES, IT WOULD RECOGNIZE INTEREST AND PENALTIES ASSOCIATED WITH ANY TAX MATTERS AS PART OF THE INCOME TAX PROVISION AND INCLUDE ACCRUED INTEREST AND PENALTIES WITH THE RELATED TAX LIABILITY IN THE STATEMENT OF FINANCIAL POSITION.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: SCHEDULE G, PART I, LINE 2B, COLUMN (V)
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: PROFESSIONAL ORGANIZATIONS WERE PAID DURING THE FISCAL YEAR TO PROVIDE SOFTWARE USED BY STUDENT CALLERS TO SOLICIT DONATIONS VIA TELEPHONE FOR THE FOUNDATION.

RecipientTable.PurposeOfGrantTxt: TO FUND ACADEMIC/PROGRAM SUPPORT AND SCHOLARSHIPS FOR STUDENTS OF EASTERN CONNECTICUT STATE UNIVERSITY.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE FOUNDATION SENDS TO THE OFFICE OF FINANCIAL AID AT EASTERN CONNECTICUT STATE UNIVERSITY, A LISTING OF AVAILABLE SCHOLARSHIPS WITH THE RELATED FUNDS/AMOUNT AND THE CRITERIA STUDENTS NEED TO MEET TO BE ELIGIBLE TO RECEIVE FUNDS. BASED ON THESE CRITERIA, THE OFFICE OF FINANCIAL AID RUNS A REPORT DESIGNED TO MATCH THE SCHOLARSHIP WITH ELIGIBLE STUDENTS. THE OFFICE OF FINANCIAL AID WILL THEN DETERMINE WHICH STUDENTS WILL RECEIVE AWARDS. AWARD LETTERS ARE THEN MAILED OUT TO RECIPIENTS. RECIPIENTS MUST ACKNOWLEDGE RECEIPT VIA AN ACCEPTANCE LETTER AND A HANDWRITTEN "THANK YOU NOTE" WITHIN A CERTAIN TIME FRAME SPECIFIED IN THE AWARD LETTER.
THE AMOUNT IN COLUMN B REPRESENTS THE NUMBER OF CONTRIBUTORS.
THE FOUNDATION LIQUIDATES ALL GIFTS OF SECURITIES THROUGH AN ACCOUNT HELD WITH A THIRD-PARTY FINANCIAL INSTITUTION.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE FORM 990 IS REVIEWED BY MANAGEMENT AND THE EXECUTIVE COMMITEE OF THE BOARD PRIOR TO SUBMITTING THE FORM 990 TO THE INTERNAL REVENUE SERVICE.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 15
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE FOUNDATION DOES NOT COMPENSATE ANY OFFICERS, DIRECTORS, TRUSTEES OR KEY EMPLOYEES. AN EMPLOYEE OF EASTERN CONNECTICUT STATE UNIVERSITY ACTS AS THE LIASON BETWEEN THE UNIVERSITY AND THE FOUNDATION.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THERE HAVE BEEN NO CHANGES MADE TO THE ORGANIZATION'S OVERSIGHT OR SELECTION PROCESSES DURING THE TAX YEAR.
